Title: Password Lockout
Steps: User enters incorrect password 3 times; system locks account for 10 minutes | Check if lockout duration is set to 10 minutes | Verify the lockout duration is correctly applied | Test with a different password to confirm | Ensure no session is reset after lockout | Verify session is invalidated correctly

Title: Password Reset
Steps: User attempts to reset password via 'Forgot Password' link | System displays a password reset confirmation | Check if reset process is initiated successfully | Verify the user receives the confirmation email | Test with invalid credentials to confirm link availability | Ensure no system errors occur during reset

Title: Error Message Display
Steps: User enters invalid credentials; system shows error message | Check if error message is displayed correctly | Verify the message includes required fields | Test with multiple failed attempts | Ensure the error message is not redundant | Check if the error message is localized
Expected: Error message displayed for invalid credentials

Title: Dashboard Redirect
Steps: Successful login redirect to dashboard | Verify the redirect URL is correct | Check if the user is redirected to the dashboard | Test with a different user or session | Ensure no redirects occur after lockout | Check if the redirect is successful

Title: Password Reset Confirmation
Steps: User attempts to reset password with incorrect credentials | System displays password reset confirmation | Check if confirmation is sent | Verify the user receives the confirmation email | Test with invalid credentials to confirm link availability | Ensure no system errors occur during reset

Title: Invalid Credentials Error
Steps: User enters invalid credentials | System displays error message | Check if the error message is correctly displayed | Test with multiple failed attempts | Verify the error message includes required fields | Ensure the error message is localized
Expected: Error message displayed for invalid credentials
